properties.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 9:41AM AKST until February 16 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches.

* WHERE...Portions of the central Inner Channels and the eastern
Gulf Coast including Juneau and Pelican.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow showers will become heavier this
afternoon through tonight. Snowfall amounts will be highly
variable due to the showery nature of the precipitation.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

An advisory means that a potentially hazardous event is already
occurring or imminent.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY
